reviews.review: This game is a lot of fun and is worth getting

Very fun, well paced, and deep FPS. 200 hours and I'm still learning so so much every time I get on. I would definitely recommend, but make sure you have people to play with; so very toxic often times playing with random teammates that it ruins the experience even in wins or during good games.
muy buen juego, solo falta kambiarlevarias kosas y estari en el top 1
I have almost 1000 hours on this game and bought it back in 2015. This game is amazing and in my opinion the best on steam. This game is definitely the most competitive game ever (if u want it to be)
Você atira no pé e o cara não sai mancando, top
Its a very good game, good community and control about hackers
The games great! I have played this game for more than 2 years and it never gets old! I really reccomend this game to  people who really  like to play fps games

Me fez deixar de lado a vida social, me fez largar meus amigos, meus parentes, me fez pensar diferente em alguns aspectos do cotidiano, e hoje e  até a faculdade pretendo continuar com cs como hobby por apenas se encaixar tão bem no fps dos sonhos pra mim, te faz esquecer precisamente de tudo até dos seus problemas. Não me arrependo das horas gastas nisso xD e das contas perdidas também, é o jogo da minha vida, sempre vai estar lá <3, nota 1000

valve, je suis fait ban du jeu alors que j'aurais jamais cheate quelqu'un a pris le controle de mon compte je vien de le recuperé jaimerais me faire deban plz ;)

Valve's undying game is still going strong over 7 years after its release and it still finds way to be a brutally difficult but rewarding experience. CS:GO is a game that makes you want to come back, but in a way that will not burn you out. Operations, despite coming out every 2 years, add content that makes the game fresh, keeping it thriving after all these years. I find it that its an experience that is unique, and that no other game has been able to rival.
I've played this game and have gotten fucked in my ass by this game. Don't start playing. Avoid at all costs. I am in too deep to quit
pretty fun tactical shooter ig, is good :)
after years playing 1.6 I've finally moved onto CSGO and enjoying it all over again, give it a try.

Played for over 5 years and over that time, it got worse and worse. Shot a guy 17x did 14 damage. You know if it hits the person because when they kill you it'll tell you how many hits landed and damage from it.

Tried it again, it's over ran with cheats now. Game has went down hill from the day it went free.
